teaser: A new report from the United Nations finds the cost of corruption increased by 40 percent in Afghanistan between 2009 and 2012. President Obama is meeting with House Democrats today to rally support for immigration reform and whether a pathway to citizenship for illegal immigrants should be contingent on tighter border security. And how productive were we in the last three months of 2012?
byline: David Brancaccio, Mitchell Hartman, Celia Hatton, Jeremy Hobson, Bilal Sarwary, Jim Burress and Janell Burley Hofmann
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, February 7, 2013
description: A new report from the United Nations finds the cost of corruption increased by 40 percent in Afghanistan between 2009 and 2012. And how productive were we in the last three months of 2012?
